# [Playbuzz](https://playbuzz.com)

Playbuzz Provider

## Implementation Details

- Provider
Name: Playbuzz
- Documentation: NONE
- HTTPS support: YES
- Fake Response: NO
- Oembed Params: maxwidth , maxheight
- Supported Hosts: playbuzz.com , app.ex.co
- Responsive response: YES
- Collections: DefaultProviderCollection
